name: Original Diner Do Not Steal
summary: Originally designed as a sound project, instead became a short visual novel about my friend's original characters and the particular eating habits that each of them have. Music, art, and writing was done by me.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Visual Novel
